r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - Add write mode to the archive comment (zip::comment property) - Add zip::setCommentName and ::setCommentIndex, add or remove entrie comment - Add zip::getCommentName and ::getCommentIndex, get an entrie comment - Add zip::setArchiveComment - Full sync with zip-0.7.1 - #8009, modify archives on windows cannot be closed
